data.name: Beats DJ - Waifus 18+ DLC
data.detailed_description:
Transform all the items in the Shop into gorgeous waifus with 3 different states each: dressed, teasing, 18+.
Turn on the "STREAM" option if you are playing on stream to transform back the waifus into items.
data.about_the_game:
Transform all the items in the Shop into gorgeous waifus with 3 different states each: dressed, teasing, 18+.
Turn on the "STREAM" option if you are playing on stream to transform back the waifus into items.
data.short_description: Transform all the items in the Shop into gorgeous waifus with 3 different states each: dressed, teasing, 18+. Also add a "STREAM" button on main menu to hide sensitive content.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7-8-10-11
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 415 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6 or lower
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Tested on Ubuntu 18.04 / Manjaro / Arch Linux
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity or sexual content
-Not suitable for watching at work
-Not suitable for all ages
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old
